comments.content: Can you be more specific as to what you're doing to recreate this? Have you run the latest nova database migrations? (nova-manage db sync).
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem

comments.content: yeah, very likely need nova-manage db sync , I encounter simliar (not exact same) issue when I update code but forgot to update db
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jichenjc

comments.content: This bug is not actionable. It needs a much better description of the problem. Please feel free to reopen with that.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sdague
